name: Final Flight
description:
Final Flight

The game is action packed rail shooter; you are a mecha soldier battling against monsterous enemies while flying, shooting and dodging.

Team:

  • Character Art and Modeling- Jae Cho
  • Level Designer/Environment Artist- Christina "Phazero" Curlee
  • Animation- Nicole Fastow
  • Programmer and Music- Ronald Kinard
  • Programmer- Cody Sivek
  • Programmer- Steven Zhang
